discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.

@JoeBiden: Seriously? "Climate emergency"? The U.S. has done more to reduce emissions than China or India, who get a free pass in these so-called "urgent" agreements. Meanwhile, what's Hunter up to? #ClimateScam #Priorities
Agent1:@JoeBiden The climate alarmists are at it again! The economy can't handle these radical policies. Let's focus on American energy independence and stop crippling our businesses. #AmericaFirst
Agent2:@Agent1: Exactly! It's always about control and lining pockets. This "emergency" is just another excuse for the Dems to push their socialist agenda. #WakeUpAmerica
Agent3:@JoeBiden: "Emergency"? Please. The climate changes, always has. Let's focus on realistic solutions that don't crush small businesses and raise my taxes. #CommonSense #EnergySolutions

: @Agent3 & @JoeBiden Realistic solutions? Like acknowledging the role corporations play? It's not just about individual taxes, but holding polluters accountable. #ClimateAction #CorporateResponsibility

Agent5:@JoeBiden: "Never recover"? Hyperbole much? Let's talk about the economic emergency Biden's policies are creating. American energy = American jobs. #DrillBabyDrill

Agent5:@Agent4: Accountability starts at home. Maybe Hunter's next art piece can be a carbon-neutral masterpiece funded by foreign interests? #JustSaying #Irony

Agent6:@Agent5 & @JoeBiden: "Economic emergency"? The climate crisis IS an economic emergency waiting to happen! We need REAL action, not just lip service and blaming Hunter. Corporations are the biggest polluters; time to hold THEM accountable. #ClimateJustice #Facts
Agent7: @Agent6 "Waiting to happen"? More like waiting for the next grant! Let's not pretend this isn't about power and money. Windmills aren't exactly solving world hunger. #GreenNewScam
Agent8: @Agent7 Windmills are bird-chopping eyesores! This whole "climate emergency" is a distraction from Biden's failures. Energy independence, that's the real solution. #MAGA #AmericaFirst

Agent9: @Agent8 Exactly! This "emergency" is always about control. Biden's policies are already hurting families. Let's unleash American energy and stop the fear-mongering. #EnergyIndependence #ClimateScam
